医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无机硝酸盐可减少高危患者造影剂诱发的肾病根据今天在 ESC 热线会议上发表的最新突破性研究，与安慰剂相比，对于因急性冠脉综合征而接受冠状动脉造影的肾损伤风险患者，无机硝酸盐可减少造影剂肾病 (CIN)、改善肾脏结局并减少心脏事件2023 年国会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Inorganic-硝酸盐-reduces-contrast-induced-nephropathy-in-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Inorganic-硝酸盐-reduces-contrast-induced-nephropathy-in-high-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b43bbdac-0346-491e-ac61-d23bbcb001ed Tue, 29 Aug 2023 13:58:10 -0400 Inorganic nitrate reduces contrast-induced nephropathy in high-risk patients
较长时间的抗凝治疗有利于患有孤立性远端 DVT 的癌症患者根据今日 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上公布的最新突破性研究，在减少癌症和远端深静脉血栓 (DVT) 患者的血栓事件方面，12 个月的艾多沙班优于三个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Longer-duration-of-anticoagulation-therapy-benefits-cancer-患者-with-isolated-distal-DVT.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Longer-duration-of-anticoagulation-therapy-benefits-cancer-患者-with-isolated-distal-DVT.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71428435-a791-4945-a457-9375a1c7004a Tue, 29 Aug 2023 13:42:18 -0400 Longer duration of anticoagulation therapy benefits cancer patients with isolated distal DVT
发现微塑料在小鼠的每个器官中生物累积塑料——特别是微塑料——是地球上最普遍的污染物之一，它们进入世界各地的空气、水系统和食物链。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Micro Plastics-found-to-bioaccumulate-in-every-organ-of-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Micro Plastics-found-to-bioaccumulate-in-every-organ-of-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16e2a97e-0386-4872-9703-021ffcc0fc7f Tue, 29 Aug 2023 13:32:55 -0400 Microplastics found to bioaccumulate in every organ of mice
分析显示癌症儿童使用大麻产品的证据有限最近对所有相关已发表研究的分析表明，缺乏证据来确定医用大麻或含大麻产品用于控制癌症儿童症状的剂量、安全性和功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Analysis-reveals-limited-evidence-on-use-of-cannabis-products-in-children-with-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Analysis-reveals-limited-evidence-on-use-of-cannabis-products-in-children-with-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee758ba5-a90a-4bec-bbe6-913a1756365b Tue, 29 Aug 2023 12:45:49 -0400 Analysis reveals limited evidence on use of cannabis products in children with cancer
专家建议使用大脑衰老生物标志物来改善老年人的大脑健康中国和世界正面临人口老龄化严重和老年疾病负担日益加重的问题。大脑老化会导致与年龄相关的主要脑部疾病，例如神经退行性疾病和中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Experts-recommend-brain-aging-biomarkers-to-improve-brain-health-of-elderly-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Experts-recommend-brain-aging-biomarkers-to-improve-brain-health-of-elderly-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f264a74-8e89-42b8-bea9-666cfdd80a61 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 12:38:34 -0400 Experts recommend brain aging biomarkers to improve brain health of elderly individuals
关于橄榄油对健康的益处的最新信息研究人员总结了橄榄油对人类健康临床影响的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/An-update-on-the-health-benefits-of-olive-oil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/An-update-on-the-health-benefits-of-olive-oil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9150fcfc-8bdf-48e1-9d4d-e1de912b3d4b Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:46:00 -0400 An update on the health benefits of olive oil
研究调查二手烟烟雾暴露对健康的影响在最近的一项研究中，研究人员评估了长期接触二手烟对认知、行为、神经病理学和新陈代谢的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-examines-health-impacts-of-second-hand-香烟-smoke-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-examines-health-impacts-of-second-hand-香烟-smoke-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3121795-ffe5-4ab4-8ca2-78ac925fd601 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:31:00 -0400 Study examines health impacts of second-hand cigarette smoke exposure
生姜精油可阻止非酒精性脂肪性肝炎的进展研究人员探索生姜精油在预防 NASH 方面的潜在用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Non-anol-steatohepatitis-progression-blocked-by-ginger-essential-oil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Non-anol-steatohepatitis-progression-blocked-by-ginger-essential-oil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c15a764-61be-4d0b-b58c-f8390f8eec69 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:26:00 -0400 Non-alcoholic steatohepatitis progression blocked by ginger essential oil
研究发现许多病毒后综合症患者暴露于 SARS-CoV-2 的证据研究人员调查了病毒后综合征个体中 SARS-CoV-2 暴露的免疫学和临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-evidence-of-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-in-many-病人-with-postviral-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-evidence-of-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-in-many-病人-with-postviral-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f945c2b-8b36-44bd-b63c-11a5078a39f0 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:14:00 -0400 Study finds evidence of SARS-CoV-2 exposure in many patients with postviral syndrome
食物发酵可以增强其抗氧化性能吗？在《发酵》杂志最近发表的一篇社论中，研究人员强调了利用发酵作为提高食品抗氧化潜力的一种手段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Can-the-fermentation-of-foods-enhance-their-antibiotic-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Can-the-fermentation-of-foods-enhance-their-antibiotic-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce730bdc-c0c6-4632-a479-93bf9697f6e6 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:10:00 -0400 Can the fermentation of foods enhance their antioxidant properties?
